name: Boots of Renewal
description:
Welcome to the ruins! You an explorer have found the Fountain of Youth! While heading back you decide to take a faster route and get one some trees. But OH NO! you set off a trap. And then you realize that you have water from the Fountain of Youth so all of the trees you stand on start to rejuvenate! Try and stay alive sa the trees get smaller and younger while dodging arrows!

UI EXPLINATION

Hearts are your health

The middle timer is the overall timer. How long can YOU survive?

The right timer is when some of the trees will age again.
